thread.title: Police pull Maria Sharapova over … to take her picture
thread.title_full: Police pull Maria Sharapova over … to take her picture | New York Post

author: Emily Saul
title: Police pull Maria Sharapova over … to take her picture
text:
Tennis star Maria Sharapova was a smash hit during her recent trip to Germany — particularly with local police.
Sharapova, 28, was pulled over by cops during an early-morning drive through the town of Dusseldorf.
But it wasn’t because she was speeding — the German officers simply wanted a photograph with the Russian beauty.
When the police stops you at 7 am on the street, only to ask for a picture. #relievedsmile pic.twitter.com/rOkrM9Wrkx 
— Maria Sharapova (@MariaSharapova) October 2, 2015 

The tennis pro has been sidelined for most of the year due to injury. The five-time Grand Slam champion had to withdraw from the Wuhan Open last week, in her first match in three months, because of an arm injury.
